
# Introduction

```{r}
penguins %>% 
  group_by(species) %>% 
  summarize(avg_weight = mean(body_mass_g, na.rm = TRUE)) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = species,
             y = avg_weight)) +
  geom_col() +
  theme_minimal()
```
